songs.title: Frailty
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Imotape Productions

[Verse 1]
Pack bags, leave now
Run away from the heat now
Shave head, senile
Don't give up when I fall down
Don't believe in Satan? Be my friend
Don't believe in God? Well, think again

[Chorus]
Frailty, touch the demons with your hand
To see the skin they're hidin' in
Frailty, sacrifice to prove your faith
This world is sure worth dying in
Frailty, touch the demons with your hand
To see the skin they're hidin' in
Frailty, sacrifice to prove your faith
This world is sure worth dying in

[Verse 2]
They are preaching sins all on the TV screen
Captions, CC's—all are here to belittle me
Draw guns, shoot me, that's an option if need be
Let's draw guns, shoot me, only option I can see

[Chorus]
Frailty, touch the demons with your hand
To see the skin they're hidin' in
Frailty, sacrifice to prove your faith
This world is sure worth dying in
Frailty, touch the demons with your hand
To see the skin they're hidin' in
Frailty, sacrifice to prove your faith
This world is sure worth dying in
